hero.title: JLPT4YOU
hero.subtitle: AI-Powered JLPT Learning Platform
hero.description: JLPT4YOU is an advanced learning platform that combines AI technology with standard JLPT curriculum, helping you progressively improve your Japanese proficiency ‚Äì from beginner to advanced levels. Whether you're at N5 or aiming for N1, we have the right path for you.

benefits.title: Key Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Outstanding features to help you conquer JLPT effectively

items.title: Practice with realistic mock exams
items.description: Exam system designed based on the structure and difficulty of official JLPT tests, helping you familiarize with the real exam format.

items.title: Automatic answer explanations with iRIN
items.description: Smart AI analyzes each answer, providing detailed explanations and personalized improvement suggestions.

items.title: Rich exam and vocabulary library with clear classification
items.description: Diverse exercise library from N5 to N1, categorized by topic and gradually increasing difficulty levels.

items.title: Detailed learning progress tracking
items.description: Progress reporting system helps you understand your strengths, weaknesses, and personalized learning path.

question.instruction: Choose the best option to fill in the blank from 1„Éª2„Éª3„Éª4.
question.explanation: The correct answer is 'Âº∑„Åè' (strongly). 'Èõ®„ÅåÂº∑„ÅèÈôç„Çã' (rain falls strongly) is a natural Japanese expression. 'È´ò„Åè' refers to height, 'Êó©„Åè' refers to speed, and 'Ëøë„Åè' refers to distance, so they are not suitable for expressing the intensity of rain. 'Âº∑„ÅèÈôç„Çã' correctly expresses the force or intensity of rainfall.

page.title: Choose JLPT Test Type
page.subtitle: Select the test type that suits your learning needs

page.title: JLPT4YOU - Custom Tests
page.subtitle: Specially designed tests with effective learning methods

info.title: About JLPT4YOU Tests
info.description: JLPT4YOU tests are carefully compiled, closely following the structure and difficulty of actual JLPT exams. Includes all sections: Vocabulary, Grammar, Reading Comprehension, and Listening Comprehension ‚Äì correct format, correct focus.

page.title: JLPT - Official Tests
page.subtitle: International standard tests with official format

info.title: About Official JLPT Tests
info.description: Official JLPT tests are designed according to the standards of the Japan Foundation. Includes all test sections: Vocabulary, Grammar, Reading Comprehension, and Listening Comprehension with accurate timing and question counts.

n1.title: JLPT N1 - Advanced
n1.description: Highest level Japanese test - 2000 kanji, 10000 vocabulary

n2.title: JLPT N2 - Upper Intermediate
n2.description: Upper intermediate Japanese test - 1000 kanji, 6000 vocabulary

n4.title: JLPT N4 - Upper Elementary
n4.description: Upper elementary Japanese test - 300 kanji, 1500 vocabulary

template.chooseSection: Choose test sections and timing that suit your learning goals.

page.title: JLPT Challenge
page.subtitle: Test your Japanese proficiency with serious practice exams

info.title: About Challenge Mode
info.description: Challenge Mode is designed to simulate real JLPT exams. The test includes all sections: vocabulary, grammar, reading comprehension, and listening comprehension. Treat this as a real exam and take it seriously.

setup.title: Challenge {level}
setup.subtitle: {description} - Serious Practice Test
setup.sectionsSubtitle: Challenge Mode includes all test sections to simulate real JLPT exams
setup.timeDescription: {minutes} minutes - According to official JLPT regulations
setup.timeNote: Challenge Mode uses standard timing to simulate real exams

rules.title: Challenge Test Rules
rules.importantDescription: Please take this test seriously and treat it as a real exam. If you want to practice, please select "JLPT Practice" from the main screen.

rule1.title: No dictionary allowed
rule1.description: Do not use dictionaries, reference books, or any supporting materials

rule2.title: No electronic devices
rule2.description: Do not use phones, tablets, or other electronic devices for assistance

rule3.title: Follow time limits
rule3.description: Complete the test within the specified time, no pausing for breaks

rules.aboutDescription: This mode is designed to simulate the real JLPT exam as closely as possible. The test includes all sections: vocabulary, grammar, reading comprehension, and listening comprehension. The results will accurately reflect your current Japanese proficiency.
